item.title: Tips for Setting Up Your Blog With Hugo 2018
item.description: There are many open source softwares for making a blog. Particularly, Hugo is becomming a first option when we make our blog without any dynamic softwares like WordPress. As far as I remember there is also a product named Octopress, but its development is stopped from 2015. There are 2 useful tips when you make an actual blog with Hugo and GitHub Pages: Use snap for installation (for Linux users) Snapcraft is a relatively new package system for Linux.

item.title: About My Blog
item.description: Who am I? An university student in Japan. Formaly worked as a frontend web engineer (mainly write React/TypeScript/etc). What is this blog? This is my first article on this blog so I wanna tell you about me, a little bit. I’m not living in US now and have never visited before. So my English skill is pretty bad. Especially in speaking and writing. But my ex-coworkers were all English speakers (of cource including non-native speakers, however all of them speaks English pretty well in comparison with me lol).
